DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate the efficacy of a specific maternal position to correct fetal position in occipito-posterior during the labor. The investigators hypothesize that the maternal position described by the Dr de Gasquet facilitate the rotation in occipito-anterior during the labor. The calculated sample size is 438 participants (219 in each group)
DOC.brief_title: Maternal Positioning and Occipitoposterior Fetal Position
DOC.criteria: singleton primiparous and multiparous Term â‰¥ 37 weeks Labor in dilatation phase (cervix effaced, permeable finger 2 to 9 cm) Diagnosis of occipitoposterior variety confirmed by ultrasound Maternal age below 18 years old Misunderstanding the French Language Full dilatation of the cervix Posture evaluated already adopted by the woman during labor
